word:
Outsiders are coming in to every meeting to hear the truth. There is now a nice couple interested. The husband has a good business, and this stands in his way; but the Lord will open the way for him. We have been here two weeks on the morrow. I do not know that we shall spend another Sabbath here. --Letter 59, 1896. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. October 1, 1987. Entire Letter.
